articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: ONGC seeks technical help to raise oil, gas output at Mumbai High field - Business Standard
articles.description: The firm has floated an international tender to identify the service provider who will help raise production from the field, ONGC said in a post on X
articles.content:
The firm has floated an international tender to identify the service provider who will help raise production from the field, ONGC said in a post on X
